meanings.definition: Without complaining or making a fuss
meanings.sent3: The puppy followed the command uncomplainingly, wagging its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood uncomplainingly through every storm.
meanings.sent5: The student listened uncomplainingly to the long lecture, determined to learn.

meanings.definition: In a patient and accepting manner
meanings.sent1: The child waited uncomplainingly for his turn on the swing.
meanings.sent2: She nodded uncomplainingly when told to redo the task.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched uncomplainingly as the mouse stole its treat.
meanings.sent4: The sun rose uncomplainingly each morning, bringing light to the world.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed uncomplainingly, soaking in the sunlight and rain.
